My name is Pawel Sarapata and I am the single developer wannabe behind MotoCrawler. I started being serious about programming in 2020, I started in Back End engineering with Python and Django, however as you can see, I am slowly exploring Front-End integration, and am hoping to become a FullStack web developer at some point in the future.

Be sure to check out My LinkedIn !

Looking forward to hearing from you (especially if you are looking for a new face to join your web development team ;) )
